data.comment: The match has started at Anfield.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
In the minute 1, Liverpool's Trent Alexander-Arnold gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tottenham defender.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Tottenham have a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Liverpool.
Anthony Taylor awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tottenham to take a throw-in in Liverpool territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
In the minute 10, In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) strikes at Anfield but his header is cleared.
Anthony Taylor signals a Tottenham throw-in in Liverpool's half.
In the minute 15, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Throw-in high up the field for Liverpool in Liverpool.
Liverpool's Sadio Mane has run offside.
In the minute 16, Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Throw-in Tottenham.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Tottenham.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, Anthony Taylor awards Liverpool a goal kick.
Mohamed Salah gets his shot on target but fails to score for Liverpool.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Tottenham at Anfield.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Goal! Liverpool have got their heads in front thanks to a Mohamed Salah strike.
In the minute 28, Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Liverpool's Curtis Jones gets in a shot on goal at Anfield. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 33, Sadio Mane for Liverpool drives towards goal at Anfield. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Heung Min Son is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Giovani Lo Celso with an assist there.
In the minute 34, Tottenham needs to be cautious. Liverpool have an attacking throw-in.
Roberto Firmino of Liverpool smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick Tottenham.
In the minute 38, Anthony Taylor signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Tottenham's area.
Throw-in for Liverpool at Anfield.
Liverpool drives forward and Sadio Mane gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Liverpool in the half of Tottenham.
Roberto Firmino of Liverpool is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Tottenham.
In the minute 45, At Anfield the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Tottenham.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Liverpool.
Tottenham's Steven Bergwijn gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Liverpool at Anfield.
In the minute 47, Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Giovani Lo Celso (Tottenham) gets a yellow card.
Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
Curtis Jones (Liverpool) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 50, In Liverpool Tottenham drive forward through Harry Kane. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Harry Kane of Tottenham gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Liverpool at Anfield.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
In the minute 54, Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Liverpool.
Pierre Hojbjerg is booked for the away team.
Liverpool's Sadio Mane gets in a shot on goal at Anfield. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, Liverpool pushes forward through Mohamed Salah, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Can Liverpool capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tottenham's half?
In the minute 58, Lucas Moura is replacing Giovani Lo Celso for Tottenham at Anfield.
Liverpool have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tottenham have a goal kick.
Steven Bergwijn hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Liverpool for Tottenham.
In the minute 63, Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Harry Kane (Tottenham) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
In the minute 66, Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
Roberto Firmino gets his shot on target but fails to score for Liverpool.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Liverpool to check on Serge Aurier, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 68, Serge Aurier has recovered and rejoins the match in Liverpool.
Liverpool's Mohamed Salah is on target but unsuccessful.
Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 70, Liverpool drive upfield and Roberto Firmino gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tottenham defender.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 73, Liverpool apply pressure at Anfield and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Sadio Mane but the strike hits the bar!
Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
In the minute 74, Anthony Taylor awards Tottenham a goal kick.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
In the minute 76, Jose Mourinho is making the team's second substitution at Anfield with Sergio Reguilon replacing Steven Bergwijn.
Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
In the minute 80, Tottenham's Harry Kane breaks free at Anfield. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Liverpool at Anfield.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Tottenham.
In the minute 83, Curtis Jones (Liverpool) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Free kick Liverpool.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Harry Kane.
Tottenhamâ€™s Harry Kane is on his feet again at Anfield.
In the minute 87, Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
The away team replace Heung Min Son with Dele Alli.
Free kick for Tottenham in the half of Liverpool.
In the minute 89, In Liverpool Tottenham drive forward through Eric Dier. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Roberto Firmino heads in to make it 2-1 at Anfield.
Great play from Andrew Robertson to set up the goal.
